name: Bikini Martini
description: An awesome drink to sip by the pool! Garnish with an orange wheel
instructions: Combine rum, vodka, and pineapple juice in a drink shaker
Pour in a martini glass, add a touch of grenadine in the middle.

name: The Paloma
instructions: Top one or two shots of tequila with grapefruit soda. The classic brand to use is grapefruit-flavored Jarritos, but you could try it with any brand you like, or DIY with grapefruit juice, seltzer, and simple syrup.

name: The Whiskey Ginger
instructions: Top one or two shots of whiskey with ginger ale
Garnish with a lemon twist. It’s called a “Horse’s Neck” if it’s served with a long, curly strip of lemon peel.

name: Gin & Tonic
description: One of the most iconally classic drinks of all time
instructions: Top one or two shots gin with tonic water
Garnish with a lime wedge. Duh.

name: The Cuba Libre
description: Your basic rum and coke! Yum yum
instructions: Top one or two shots of rum with Coke
Garnish with a lime wedge. (NB that this drink only gets to use the fancy Spanish name if you serve it with lime.)

name: Bloody Mary
instructions: Pour vodka into salted glass with ice
Garnish with celery and/or lime wedge
